attributes.action: Close the loop hole of arranged marriages
attributes.additional_details: Thousands come into the uk under the guise of arranged marriage due to their beliefs. Where large amounts of money are paid between families for a back door entry into this country
attributes.background: With a large enough minority population now in the uk. Is the practice of arranged marriage between uk and foreign citizens necessary

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

The Home Office already takes action on marriages or civil partnerships which are entered into for immigration advantage:

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/256257/Sham_Marriage_and_Civil_Partnerships.pdf
